name: Jim Carrey
summary: Jim Carrey. Actor: Ace Ventura: Pet Detective. Jim Carrey, Canadian-born and a U.S. citizen since 2004, is an actor and producer famous for his rubbery body movements and flexible facial expressions. The two-time Golden Globe-winner rose to fame as a cast member of the Fox sketch comedy In Living Color (1990) but leading roles in Ace Ventura: Pet Detective (1994), Dumb and Dumber (1994) and The Mask (1994) established him...
awards: Nominated for 1 Primetime Emmy | 54 wins & 101 nominations total
